name: moli-ad-tag
description: An ad tag implementation called moli

scripts.build:examples: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && yarn build:example:instant && yarn build:example:publisher && yarn build:example:ie-11 && yarn build:example:publisher-prebid-global
scripts.build:example:instant: mkdir -p dist/instant && cd examples/instant && yarn && yarn build && cp dist/* ../../dist/instant
scripts.build:example:publisher: mkdir -p dist/publisher && cd examples/publisher && yarn && yarn build && cp dist/* ../../dist/publisher
scripts.build:example:publisher-global-prebid: mkdir -p dist/publisher-prebid-global && cd examples/publisher-prebid-global && yarn && yarn build && cp dist/* ../../dist/publisher-prebid-global
scripts.build:example:ie-11: mkdir -p dist/ie-11 && cd examples/ie-11 && yarn && yarn build && cp dist/* ../../dist/ie-11
scripts.docs: yarn typedoc --readme source/ts/types/README.md --theme default --out docs/ source/ts/types/
scripts.preversion: yarn compile && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn build:debug && yarn build:examples && yarn docs
